Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ALPCO Calprotectin Chemiluminescence ELISA and Easy Stool Extraction Device for quantitative measurement of fecal calprotectin as a marker of intestinal inflammation.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of fecal calprotectin in human stool to aid in diagnosis of inflammatory bowel disease (IBD), specifically Crohn’s disease and ulcerative colitis, and to differentiate IBD from irritable bowel syndrome (IBS), in conjunction with other clinical and laboratory findings; the extraction device is for stool specimen preparation for this test.
